desc.en: As Sensei and Ichika walk through Trinity, they see a small disturbance on the street. Sensei asks if it's okay to not intervene, and Ichika says it's okay because she's already busy and it's not that big of a deal. With that, they finish up their walk and Sensei joins Ichika as she goes back to her work.
desc.jp: As Sensei and Ichika walk through Trinity, they see a small disturbance on the street. Sensei asks if it's okay to not intervene, and Ichika says it's okay because she's already busy and it's not that big of a deal. With that, they finish up their walk and Sensei joins Ichika as she goes back to her work.
desc.zh_cn: {cf一花}负责担任老师在{sn三一}的向导。两人在移动过程中在街上目睹了一场小骚动。老师问{cf一花}是否要插手，{cf一花}表示还有工作要做，而且也不是什么大问题，所以不要紧，然后便继续前进。就这样，两人结束了日程。{cf一花}回去整理刚刚推迟的工作，老师也和他一起。

desc.zh_cn: 等下，接下来要发生什么？！举例：第137首曲子

desc.en: The Sisterhood discovers an important scripture, and leaves Hinata in charge of it before making an official announcement. However, Hinata accidentally shreds the scripture.
desc.jp: The Sisterhood discovers an important scripture, and leaves Hinata in charge of it before making an official announcement. However, Hinata accidentally shreds the scripture.
desc.zh_cn: {cn修女会}挖掘出重要的经典，在发表会之前，将其交给{cf日向}管理。但是{cf日向}却不小心把经典弄散了。

desc.en: The 105th track in Blue Archive OST, especially known for usages with the students from Arius Satellite School.
desc.jp: The 105th track in Blue Archive OST, especially known for usages with the students from Arius Satellite School.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第105首曲子，尤其用于阿里乌斯(奥利斯)分校的学生。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.en: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.jp: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第七首曲子，以其与人物及故事相关的梗和二创而相当热门和出名。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

name.en: The Clumsy Sister and the Magician of the Old Library
name.jp: The Clumsy Sister and the Magician of the Old Library
name.zh_cn: 冒失修女和古书馆的魔术师

desc.en:
An important event with the Sisterhood's reputation at stake!
But things begin to go awry from the get-go...
desc.jp:
An important event with the Sisterhood's reputation at stake!
But things begin to go awry from the get-go...
desc.zh_cn: {sn三一}重要的经典变得四分五裂了！为了复原经典，{cf日向}与老师在{sn三一}各处东奔西跑。究竟能不能在典礼开始前完成复原呢！？

name.en: The Clumsy Sister and the Magician of the Old Library
name.jp: The Clumsy Sister and the Magician of the Old Library
name.zh_cn: 冒失修女和古书馆的魔术师

desc.en:
An important event with the Sisterhood's reputation at stake!
But things begin to go awry from the get-go...
desc.jp:
An important event with the Sisterhood's reputation at stake!
But things begin to go awry from the get-go...
desc.zh_cn: {sn三一}重要的经典变得四分五裂了！为了复原经典，{cf日向}与老师在{sn三一}各处东奔西跑。究竟能不能在典礼开始前完成复原呢！？

desc.en: Mari prepares some chocolate that looks like a statue in prayer. Sensei delightedly accepts Mari's chocolate, but after struggling to find a way to eat it in a way that's not blasphemous, they decide to just put it on display.
desc.jp: Mari prepares some chocolate that looks like a statue in prayer. Sensei delightedly accepts Mari's chocolate, but after struggling to find a way to eat it in a way that's not blasphemous, they decide to just put it on display.
desc.zh_cn: {cf玛丽}准备了一个祈祷者造型巧克力想送给老师。虽然老师很喜欢这个礼物，但由于他怎么想都觉得吃掉那个巧克力是在亵渎神明，因此他最终还是决定将巧克力当成展示品。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。
